content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my property, Hassan. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. However, as a landlord, I would like to emphasize that my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. Therefore, I would like to propose a rental price that is reasonable for both of us. May I know what your budget is for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 600 Euros per month. I am willing to negotiate to find a suitable price.

Also, I want to be on good terms with the landlord, so I am willing to sign a longer term lease if that would help lower the monthly rent.

Thank you for your consideration.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate and sign a longer term lease, Hassan. Based on your budget and the fact that the apartment is only 25 square meters, I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price that takes into account the value of the property and the cost of living in Munich.

If you are willing to sign a longer term lease, I am open to discussing a lower rental price. However, please note that the longer the lease, the lower the monthly rent will be. I would be happy to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Do you have any questions or concerns about this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
There are no questions or concerns. I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you, Hassan, for agreeing to the rental price of 700 Euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to sign a longer term lease and look forward to working with you as our tenant.

Please note that the rental price does not include utilities such as electricity, water, and gas. These will be the responsibility of the tenant. I will provide you with a list of local utility providers that you can use.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. I look forward to welcoming you to my apartment.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
